title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
content: Up for auction are two lots:1. 2015 Denarium Eagle gold-plated, factory funded by Denarium with 0.01 BTC - ORIGINAL SEALED2. 2015 Denrium BTC, funded (not sure if by user or factory) with 0.01 BTCBoth coins are funded and come with the intact hologram attached.  The Eagle (gold plated) one is in perfect condition, I am first owner and never been out of capsule ofc.The "BTC" coin appears to be worn off - probably was taken out of capsule by the previous owner.If you are a new account without any positive trading trust please send me a pm and pay 0.005 BTC collateral (to me or a trusted escrow) to verify your legimate intent of bidding in this auction. Funds will be returned after successful auction end and payment.Starting prices:Lot 1: Denarium EAGLE gold plated: 0.015Lot 2: Denarium "BTC" brass coin: 0.012Minimum bid increase: 0.001SPECIAL OFFER:- free shipping if you win both lotsAUCTION ENDS: Sunday 2022-06-12, 4 pm EST (22:00 Berlin time)Shipping: Addition to the winning bid. Ships from EU. Buyer responsible for any local customs/duties.Ranges from 10 / 15 €: EU / outside EU. Including tracking.Sniping: Each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutes (for all lots).Payment accepted in: BTC, LTC, ETH or XMRExcluded from bidding: If you are a new account, or have issues in your trust feedback, please PM prior to bidding. Copper membership is the way to go as a new member. I will exclude in extreme cases, but I reserve the right to exclude/disqualify bidders at my sole discretion.  Forum downtime: If the forum goes offline in the final 4 hours of the auction I may extend the auction at my discretion.Payment required within 48 hours after auction end.Payment address will be supplied to the winner via PM (only here via bitcointalk!).  Make sure you are communicating with me and not an imposter account before sending funds or sensible information!Feel free to ask questions via PM - or in this thread if directly related to the auctioned items.
